availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
The State of Ohio
Hamilton County } SS
City of Cincinnati

Personally appeared before me the undersigned, a Notary Public in and for said County, Ashton B. McManama who having been duly appointed "A Commissioner of Deeds for the State of Kentucky and Commissioned by the Governor thereof. for the state of Ohio" Made Solemn oath that he will, "well and truly execute and perform all the duties of his station" as Commissioner of Deeds for the State of Kentucky, in and for the state of Ohio
Sworn to before me and Subscribed in my presence this 15th day of May A D 1863

D. K. Cady Jr
Notary Public
Ham Co O
NOTARIAL SEAL,
D. K. CADY, Jr
HAMILTON COUNTY

Ohio
Oath
Comr of Deeds
A. B. McManama
Filed May 16, 1863.
